page.title: 14WOODVILLE NURSERIES
page.content: Woodville Nurseries was built at the turn of the century, and still has the original gates. They sell baskets of flowers,bouquets and cable orders to countries all over the world. They do a lot of weddings, funerals and christenings. The greenhouses are joined together in rows. They have 9 workers , 7 full time, and 2 part time. The people who work there do not wear a special uniform. The only machines they use are hedge trimmers and rotovators. They use fresh manure as fertiliser. They have an original white rose that is still climbing up a wall. It belonged to the first owners. The nurseries specialise in chrysanthemums. The rarest and most expensive flowers they sell are orchids. Daffodils are most popular from Christmas to Easter.
